events.note: NOTE: The events of the Kirby Fighters rips take place in an unspecified timeframe. We do not know much about when these take place, other than that these all take place in the 2000s. Therefore, instead of dates, the rip titles will be used to date events.

events.title: One Noisy Morning - Wario Land II
events.content: Monochrome Wario listens to bass-boosted loadsamoney out loud. This hurts Waluigi's ears.

events.title: Main Theme - Kirby Fighters
events.content:
Monochrome Wario threatens Monochrome Kirby into giving him a Maxim Tomato. Meanwhile, 2B searches and eventually finds Waluigi's Taco Stand in the (colored) Kirby Fighters universe. She pays for a garlic taco and uses it to warp into the GB Kirby Fighters universe. When she appears, Monochrome Kirby attempts to talk to her, though 2B pays him no mind.

Noticing the portal, Monochrome Kirby and later, Monochrome Wario, jump into the portal the Garlic Taco created and meet Kirby in the main Kirby Fighters universe. Monochrome Wario expresses interest in Kirby's car and they, along with Monochrome Kirby, end up fighting for it in a turn-based battle. Kirby ends up winning by running over Monochrome Wario. Monochrome Kirby is offered to stay at Kirby's house.

events.title: Main Theme - Kirby Fighters Deluxe (one day after Main Theme - Kirby Fighters)
events.content:
Kirby wakes up Monochrome Kirby. They squabble for a bit over Kirby's method of waking up Monochrome Kirby before they go to Waddlemart soon after. Monochrome Kirby is tasked with finding a dildo and asks Mr. L for help. Mr. L kidnaps Monochrome Kirby and requests Kirby to meet him in the back and give him all his money, or else Monochrome Kirby dies.

Kirby throws his grocery basket at Mr. L, who decides to mug him for all he's worth upon realizing Kirby has cocaine. Mr. L pulls out a gun and mocks him for believing he could even stand a chance, although Kirby wins via stabbing him with a pixelated dildo.

In the April Fool's version of this video, Kirby lets Monochrome Kirby sleep. This triggers the secret ending. Awesome.

events.title: Main Theme - Kirby Fighters 2
events.content:
Kirby and Monochrome Kirby debate fast food restaurants, until Waluigi's Taco Stand rolls into the area. He advertises the Green de la Bean Burrito Special, although Monochrome Kirby orders an Indian Taco instead.

Monochrome Kirby's reaction to the taco burns both Kirby and Waluigi. Waluigi states that Monochrome Kirby "will pay for this", and they begin fighting. Halfway through, however, Kirby snatches the time-traveling/interdimensional taco and sends Waluigi to the CCC, and the Garlic Taco alters Waluigi's memory so that he forgets how to make tacos.
BonziBuddy receives an update changing the character associated with the program from Peedy to an original character named Bonzi.
Jet Set Radio releases on the SEGA Dreamcast. DJ Professor K debuts as the titular radio station's DJ.
Dr. Dre releases his single "The Next Episode", a collaboration with Snoop Dogg.
Mario Tennis releases on the Nintendo 64. Waluigi, the best friend of Wario, debuts.
The first Taiko no Tatsujin game releases in Japanese arcades.
The movie Shrek releases in cinemas in America; the usage of All Star in its opening credits propels Smash Mouth to stardom.

Islamist hijackers affiliated with Al-Qaeda hijack 4 planes to commit suicide attacks against the United States. 3 of the planes hit their targets (The Twin Towers and the Pentagon), whilst a fourth is downed intentionally by its passengers.
The first Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney game releases for Game Boy Advance. Phoenix Wright debuts as the game's titular attorney.
Jet Set Radio Future releases on the XBOX.
WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Microgame$ is released for Game Boy Advance, sporting a new look for Wario.

The United States and 39 other countries begin their invasion of Iraq, accompanied with a massive bombing campaign. Santa, having been captured, escapes Iraq and turns it into a Christmas winter wonderland using Christmas Spirit Bombs.
Hypercam 2 is released by Hyperionics.
The first episode of LazyTown airs on television in Iceland.
Snoop Dogg releases Drop It Like It's Hot.
Daisuke Amaya releases Cave Story for free on Windows PCs.
American social media and online video sharing platform YouTube is established; co-founder Jawed Karim posts the first ever video, titled 'me at the zoo'.
The LazyTown clipshow episode "Dear Diary" airs on television. A character by the name of Stingy Spoilero sings The Mine Song.
THE iDOLM@STER is released in Japanese arcades.

Martin Billany creates a gag dub of the Yu-Gi-Oh! anime under the handle of LittleKuriboh, creating what is now called Yu-Gi-Oh! The Abridged Series.

The series acts as the originator of the entire 'Abridged' genre, and many impostor channels pop up in the following years to leech off its success.
A pornographic video recording involving an African-American man screaming very loudly is uploaded to the Internet.
The program MIDIJam is released.
Rhythm Tengoku is released on the Game Boy Advance in Japan, featuring a minigame called "Tap Trial"
Nico Nico Douga, a video sharing site similar to YouTube, launches.
Chip tha Ripper does a freestyle rap on Street Starz TV Radio that goes viral, primarily due to the line 'interior crocodile alligator'.
THE iD@LMASTER releases on Xbox 360, containing the song "GO MY WAY!!"
A video named Hammoud is uploaded to YouTube by Tahloube S., featuring a 3D model of a child dancing and clapping to a song. The character of Hamood Habibi originates from this video.
Anthony Pinto creates a YouTube account with the username "chadwarden" for the sole purpose of trolling. Chad Warden uploads Why the PS3 is better than the Wii and 360, part 1.
The first episode of The Nutshack airs on Myx Tv.
Soulja Boy releases his hit single Crank That (Soulja Boy).
The Patriotic [Friends] use the audio clip of Loud [Friend] screaming to troll people on Second Life.
Doug Walker launches a YouTube series called "Nostalgia Critic".
Super Why! airs on PBS Kids for the first time.
Team Fortress 2 releases on PC as part of a Valve collection of games called The Orange Box. The titular Team Fortress, a group of 9 mercenaries, debut.
123zc creats his Youtube channel.
Barkley, Shut up and Jam! Gaiden is released. This game becomes responsible for the association between Charles Barkley and Space Jam.
SilvaGunner, a YouTube channel dedicated to uploading video game music, is created. TimmyTurnersDad, a similar channel, is also created.
Chad Warden's account is deleted.
Jack Black makes a cameo appearance on Sesame Street and defines the word "octagon" with Elmo.
Kirby Super Star Ultra is released for the Nintendo DS. Masked Dedede, King Dedede's "serious face", first appears here in the Revenge of the King sub-game.
Toby Fox finishes his first work, EarthBound: Halloween Hack, and releases it on the starmen.net forums.
Joe Vargas creates the YouTube channel "AngryJoeShow".
THE iDOLM@STER SP: Wandering Star releases for the PlayStation Portable. Takane Shijou debuts.
hhgregg publicly shows off their new mascot, "HH", for the first time.
HH is used in his first advertisement.
thebluecat paints 3 cats playing various instruments. SiIvaGunner later adapts this painting to be the basis for the King for Another Day team "The Jazz Cats".
The hhgregg Red Tag Sale advertisement plays on television for the first time.
The Walt Disney Company acquires Marvel Entertainment for $4,000,000,000 USD.
A young boy from Onett rises from the dead.
